title: Fps stuck at 60?
body:
I play on a gaming laptop and Im stuck at 60 frames in full screen and borderless. In windowed I get around 170-200 however they seem very choppy and unplayable. Yes, VSync and Anti-Aliasing is of. I have tried with Max setting and the lowest. I did notice one game in full screen for a mili second I was getting 223fps. Frames are uncapped anyone know what to do? The game also tends to lag, minions staying alive when they should be dead.

870 GeForce (Laptop) I play on my tv. When I play on my laptops screen fulscreen I get 60fps (still does not work) however window I get 200-300

replies.body:
It sounds like this may be caused by the *Game DVR* feature built-into the Windows Game Bar that was recently upgraded in some Windows 10 updates. I strongly recommend disabling this feature with [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this helped.
I take it back after playing  a few games im getting huge fps drop. It seems like they are fighting each other its going 60-100-60-100 and so on.
Never mind my battery was just low you fixed it thanks
